description: Vssadmin being used to delete shadow copies
raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Events><Event xmlns='http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events/event'><System><Provider Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing' Guid='{54849625-5478-4994-a5ba-3e3b0328c30d}'/><EventID>4688</EventID><Version>2</Version><Level>0</Level><Task>13312</Task><Opcode>0</Opcode><Keywords>0x8020000000000000</Keywords><TimeCreated SystemTime='2024-12-17T05:06:53.0085416Z'/><EventRecordID>18134</EventRecordID><Correlation/><Execution ProcessID='4' ThreadID='3276'/><Channel>Security</Channel><Computer>READYTHREATGO</Computer><Security/></System><EventData><Data Name='SubjectUserSid'>S-1-5-21-1395107668-2934926410-839616363-1001</Data><Data Name='SubjectUserName'>tom.hanks</Data><Data Name='SubjectDomainName'>READYTHREATGO</Data><Data Name='SubjectLogonId'>0x1b072</Data><Data Name='NewProcessId'>0x2ce0</Data><Data Name='NewProcessName'>C:\Windows\System32\vssadmin.exe</Data><Data Name='TokenElevationType'>%%1937</Data><Data Name='ProcessId'>0x1108</Data><Data Name='CommandLine'>"C:\WINDOWS\system32\vssadmin.exe" delete shadows /all /quiet</Data><Data Name='TargetUserSid'>S-1-0-0</Data><Data Name='TargetUserName'>-</Data><Data Name='TargetDomainName'>-</Data><Data Name='TargetLogonId'>0x0</Data><Data Name='ParentProcessName'>C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe</Data><Data Name='MandatoryLabel'>S-1-16-12288</Data></EventData></Event></Events>
mitre_technique:
Inhibit System Recovery
